statements: DELETE FROM insurance_policy WHERE policy_id = 101 AND premium_amount > 500.00
DELETE FROM insurance_policy WHERE risk_assessment_score < 50 AND policy_start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM risk_assessment WHERE policy_id = 2002 AND risk_score > 80;
DELETE FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_id = 100 AND policy_holder = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM risk_assessment WHERE policy_id = 200 AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM policy_risks WHERE policy_id = 1 AND factor_id = 1;
DELETE FROM policies WHERE policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM policyholders WHERE age > 60);
